mixed-citation.article-title: A new riparian Andean Potamites (Reptilia, Squamata, Gymnophtalmidae) from El Sira Mountains, central Peru, with comments on P. ecpleopus Cope 1875, and on the taxonomy and biogeography of Potamites

tp:treatment-sec.p: PERU – Ayacucho • La Mar , Carretera Chiquintirca – San Antonio ; CORBIDI 6957 . – Cusco • La Convención , Comunidad Nativa de Poyentimari ; CORBIDI 8322 , 8324 , 8328 , 8334 , 8335 .
